import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { api } from "../../api"; import { useParams } from "react-router-dom"; function Appoinment({ props }) { const { id } = useParams(); const [form, setForm] = useState({}); var todayDate = new Date().toISOString().slice(0, 10); const onSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); // console.log(form); }; useEffect(() => { api.getAppoinmentById(id).then((res) => { setForm(res); }); }, [id]); console.log(id); return ( <>
